content: only* □ 36 finishing cut yarn and weave in all ends washing and blocking is not necessary put your glass jar inside and you re ready to go copyright 2019 by jennifer lassonde www downcellarstudio com 2 tips magic_ring if you re not familiar with this cast on technique click on this link for a video tutorial you may find useful counting your rounds count each v shaped single_crochet stitch within the rectangle the area within the rectangle represents 8 rounds of single_crochet stitches use this as a guide if you lose count of your place single_crochet through the back loop when single crocheting through the back loop only insert the hook through the back loop as shown in the left photo for comparison a standard single_crochet is shown in the right photo you put your hook under both loops of the stitch you re working in this case thank you so much i hope you ve enjoyed knitting this pattern as much as i enjoyed creating it if you liked this pattern please check out my other designs on ravelry by clicking here for more check out my website there you ll find links to my audio podcast about knitting & crochet or search your favorite podcast app for the down cellar studio podcast copyright 2019 by jennifer lassonde www downcellarstudio com 3
